```python
# ä¼˜åŒ–åçš„ Mike Agent
class MikeAgent(BaseAgent):
    def __init__(self, llm_service, tool_executor, message_router):
        super().__init__(llm_service, tool_executor, message_router)
        # Mike ç›´æ¥æŒæœ‰å›¢é˜Ÿæˆå‘˜
        self.team_members = {
            "Emma": EmmaAgent(llm_service, tool_executor, message_router),
            "Bob": BobAgent(llm_service, tool_executor, message_router),
            "Alex": AlexAgent(llm_service, tool_executor, message_router),
        }
        # Mike æŒæœ‰ Task Scheduler
        self.task_scheduler = TaskScheduler(message_router)
        # æ³¨å†Œæ‰€æœ‰ Agent åˆ° Task Scheduler
        for agent in self.team_members.values():
            self.task_scheduler.register_agent(agent)
    
    def process_user_message(self, message):
        # åˆ†æéœ€æ±‚ï¼Œåˆ›å»ºä»»åŠ¡
        task_plan = self.create_task_plan(message)
        # æäº¤ä»»åŠ¡åˆ° Task Scheduler
        for task in task_plan.tasks:
            self.task_scheduler.schedule_task(task)

# Task Scheduler ä¸æ‰€æœ‰ Agent å…³è”
class TaskScheduler:
    def __init__(self, message_router):
        self.message_router = message_router
        self.agents = {}  # æ‰€æœ‰æ³¨å†Œçš„ Agent
        self.task_queue = []
    
    def register_agent(self, agent: BaseAgent):
        self.agents[agent.name] = agent
    
    def assign_task_to_agent(self, task: Task):
        agent = self.agents[task.assignee]
        agent.execute_task(task)
    
    def on_task_completed(self, task_id: str, agent_name: str):
        # Agent å®Œæˆä»»åŠ¡åè°ƒç”¨
        self.mark_completed(task_id)
        self.check_dependent_tasks(task_id)
        # åˆ†é…ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªå°±ç»ªä»»åŠ¡
        next_task = self.get_next_ready_task()
        if next_task:
            self.assign_task_to_agent(next_task)

# æ¯ä¸ª Agent éƒ½è¿æ¥åˆ° Message Router å’Œ Task Scheduler
class EmmaAgent(BaseAgent):
    def execute_task(self, task):
        # å‘é€çŠ¶æ€åˆ° Message Router
        self.message_router.send_to_websocket(
            message=AgentMessage(agent="Emma", status="working")
        )
        # æ‰§è¡Œä»»åŠ¡...
        result = self.do_work(task)
        # é€šçŸ¥ Task Scheduler å®Œæˆ
        self.task_scheduler.on_task_completed(task.task_id, "Emma")
        # å‘é€å®Œæˆæ¶ˆæ¯
        self.message_router.send_to_websocket(
            message=AgentMessage(agent="Emma", status="completed")
        )
```
